Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a red spot on my left forearm that has been growing larger.
How long have you noticed the spot and has its color or texture changed over time?
The spot was noticed a few weeks after birth and it has become larger, but I haven't observed any changes in its color or texture.
Do you have any other similar spots on your body?
No, I do not have any other similar spots on my body.

No, there is no family history of similar skin issues or other skin diseases.
Does the spot cause any pain or discomfort?
No, the spot does not cause any pain or discomfort.
Final Diagnosis: Infantile Hemangioma
